pipe

public static void pipe(java.io.InputStream in,
                        java.io.OutputStream out,
                        int bufSize)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Copies the contents of an InputStream to an OutputStream, then closes both.

Parameters:
in - The source stream.
out - The destination stram.
bufSize - Number of bytes to attempt to copy at a time.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If any sort of read/write error occurs on either stream.

pipe

public static void pipe(java.io.InputStream in,
                        java.io.OutputStream out)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Shorthand for pipeStream(java.io.InputStream, java.io.OutputStream, int). A default buffer of 4KB is used.

Parameters:
in - The source stream.
out - The target stream.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If any sort of read/write error occurs on either stream.

getUTF8Resource

public static java.lang.String getUTF8Resource(java.lang.String name)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
Uses the current thread's context class loader to fetch a resource.

Parameters:
name - the identifier for a resource in the classpath.
Returns:
the resource as a String, converted from bytes with UTF-8.
Throws:
java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the resource could not be located.
java.io.IOException - if the resource could not be fetched.

readLong

public static long readLong(java.io.InputStream in)
                     throws java.io.IOException
Returns:
the next long in the stream if present. If EOF was reached during read, an exception is thrown. The long must be stored in big-endian format.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if a fatal error occured during read.
java.io.EOFException - if EOF was reached during read.
